name: JEWISH FAMILY PRESCHOOL-CONGREGATION BETH SHOLOM
description: A preschool with Judaic values and culture. The classroom experiences are guided by Jewish holidays and traditions, demonstrated especially by our weekly All School Shabbat and Havdalah rituals. Children also learn about Judaica through stories, smells, tastes, sounds, and touch. The CBS office is open to the public: Monday–Thursday 9:00 a.m.–4:00 p.m. Fridays 9:00 a.m.–3:00 p.m.
